greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Column index of n in A191450: a(3n) = 1, a(3n+1) = 1, a(3n+2) = 1 + a(n+1).
comment: Equally, the row index of n in A254051.
a(n) is the 3-adic valuation of A087289(n-1). - _Fred Daniel Kline_, Jan 11 2017
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..9842
formula: a(n) = A051064(2n-1), i.e., the 3-adic valuation of 6n-3. - _Cyril Damamme_, Aug 04 2015
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 24 2015
